TITLE.P: Commissioning of Enabling Specialist Provision for CITB

SHORT_DESCR.P: CITB requires one or more training providers to provide ESP for specialist applied-skills programme for 37 occupations leading to a National or Scottish vocational qualification (NVQ or SVQ).
NVQ / VQ Level 2 Asbestos Removal.
—18 months – 12 months off job modules, followed by 6 months’ portfolio build and assessment.
